oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A certain portion of the Ostrich not to be eaten by children. In the Katkop dialect by Díä!kwãin (L V.
20. 5573 rev. and 5574 rev.). ||xabbitten ||xabbitten ate the forbidden part of the ostrich and developed growths on his face afterwards.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parts of the ostrich not to be eaten by children
